subject: Football
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. fined Titans owner Bud Adams $250,000 for making an obscene gesture at Buffalo fans while celebrating Tennessee’s victory over the Bills in Nashville on Sunday.
snippet: The N.F.L. fined Titans owner Bud Adams $250,000 for making an obscene gesture at Buffalo fans while celebrating Tennessee’s victory over the Bills in Nashville on Sunday.
